b8bfae81-5895-4b24-8979-1a8e10af0c17.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated an understanding of basic business foundation principles essential to business start-up and retention. The foundational course, facilitated by industry specific professionals, include basics in Business Legal, Business Accounting, Business Insurance, Human Resources, Business Banking, Commercial Real Estate, Marketing, Technology, Communications & Support. Additionally the badge earner has participated in hours of Coaching/Mentor support to enhance skills.
b8bfae81-5895-4b24-8979-1a8e10af0c17.name: THE WINNING TEAM MODEL SERIES

issuer.summary: issued by Inner Peace Coalition Incorporated

alignments.name: The Winning Team Model
alignments.description: The Winning Team model is designed to provide SUPPORT to help INCREASE the likelihood of business start-up & retention. Facilitated by industry professionals and mentors, participants are taught to 1. Develop a business WINNING TEAM 2. Develop a BUSINESS PORTFOLIO (Business Plan, Business Structure; EIN; Dun’s registration; Budget/Projections).

badge_template_activities.title: 16 hours of The Winning Team Model course work
16 hours group and individual guided Coaching and Mentorship
Developed a business portfolio (business, plan, budget & projections, etc.)
